physDesc.additional: Script: dpe tshugs. Lines per folio: 9 on fols. 1b and 2a; 1 on fol. 2b. No folio numbers. Orthography: - Abbreviations (e.g., for theg chen, bdud rtsi, phyogs su, 'bras bu, sdug bsngal, etc.) Bindu for m - Numerals used for numbers and for phonetic value (e.g., 4+n for bzhin) - Particle pa/ba occasionally takes the form pa after final –ng (phreng pa, snang pa) - Superabundant 'a rjes ’jug (e.g., dpe') - laswo for la sogs Insertions by two different hands, in dbu med (1b4, 2a7) and dbu can (2a1).

spring yig bdud rtsi'i thigs pa bzhugs so ||
rgya gar skad du || le kha a mrï ta ti la ka nA ma kA ri ka || bod skad du || spring yig bdud rtsi'i thigs pa zhes bya ba || 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo ||

lg.l: chos rnaMs rang bzhin stong pa'i tshul la 'jug pa'i sgo ||
yang dag rigs tshogs klu grub zhal nas gsungs pa de ||

rigs pa'i dbang
phyug rnaM 'grel mdzad pa'i gzhung mdzes las ||
sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku tshogs ni ||
gzhan gyi rnaM rig snang pa ste ||
brgya byin gzugs brnyan la sogs dpe' ||
mdo nas ji skad gsung de bzhin ||

body.ab: dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis || rga ston shes rab grags laswo pa gtsong kha ru gsuM gyi dge 'dun la spring pa'i yi ge bdud rtsi thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho ||

lo tsa ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis || dga'
ston shes rab grags la sogs pa tsong ka ru gsum gyi dge 'dun la springs pa'i yi ge bdud rtsi'i thig le zhes bya ba rdzogs so || ||

stong nyid 'chi med bdud rtsi'i bcud ||
thugs skyed dpag bsam 'dod 'jor ni ||
gang drangs rkos byed dga' bde'i dpal ||
bris pa shes rab bzang po yin | shubhaM ||
